endpoint.title: Server Endpoint
endpoint.description: The full url of the Elasticsearch server

username.title: Username
username.description: Basic auth username to access a secure Elasticsearch server

password.title: Password
password.description: Basic auth password to access a secure Elasticsearch server

apiKeyId.title: API Key ID
apiKeyId.description: The Key ID to used when accessing an enterprise Elasticsearch instance.

apiKeySecret.title: API Key Secret
apiKeySecret.description: The secret associated with the API Key ID.
